item.title: MIUI OS3.0.8.0.WPLCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Turbo 5 Max China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Turbo 5 Max China

Codename: dash

Version: OS3.0.8.0.WPLCNXM | 16.0

Size: 10.4 GB

MD5: b02e0cbe8887ad5417ae03a6ca959a25

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Customized performance scheduling for Ticket purchase mode
Fix: Compatibility issues for some types of networks
[Home screen]
Fix: Home screen wasn't loaded properly in some cases
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: Naruto lobby frame rate performance
Fix: WPS crashed in some cases

Download: Here
